h1. How to access and enable the eXo IDE

Before working with the eXo IDE gadget, make sure that you are logged in the portal. 
Then, select *Group > Developers Page > IDE* on the top menu (see Illustration 1) to open the eXo IDE gadget.

!eXo_IDE_gadget_in_platform.png!

*Illustration 1. Access the eXo IDE gadget in eXo Platform 3.0*

h1. Requirements

Supported Web browsers:
* Mozilla Firefox 3.0+ 
* Internet Explorer7.0+
* Safari 3.2+
* Google Chrome 5.0+
